about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a frontend developer, sound technician and music producer, my passion about music and programming has leaded me to learn both as self-taught person and formal education. Currently I'm studying the software development career at UTN General Pacheco Regional Faculty. I love to stay up to date and keep learning about new techs and tools to improve my work.
